name: Arsenal
description: Arsenal, founded in 1886, is one of the most successful clubs in English football, with 13 league titles and 14 FA Cups. Known for their attacking style and 'Invincibles' season in 2003-04, they play at the Emirates Stadium in North London.

name: Aston Villa
description: Aston Villa, established in 1874, is one of the oldest clubs in England. They have won seven league titles, seven FA Cups, and a European Cup in 1982. Villa Park, their home ground, is one of the most iconic stadiums in English football.

name: Bournemouth
description: AFC Bournemouth, nicknamed 'The Cherries', have steadily risen through the English football pyramid. Founded in 1899, they reached the Premier League for the first time in 2015 and are known for their attractive style of play.

name: Brentford
description: Brentford, founded in 1889, is a club that has experienced a resurgence in recent years, reaching the Premier League for the first time in 2021. Known for their innovative approach to recruitment, they play at the Brentford Community Stadium.

name: Brighton & Hove Albion
description: Brighton & Hove Albion, established in 1901, is known for its vibrant attacking football. After decades in lower divisions, they reached the Premier League in 2017 and have since become a steady force in the top flight.

name: Burnley
description: Burnley FC, founded in 1882, is one of the founding members of the Football League. The club has won two league titles and an FA Cup. Known for their strong defensive play, they call Turf Moor their home.

name: Chelsea
description: Chelsea, founded in 1905, has become one of the most successful clubs in English football in the modern era. With six league titles, eight FA Cups, and two UEFA Champions League titles, they play at Stamford Bridge in London.

name: Crystal Palace
description: Crystal Palace, established in 1905, is known for its passionate fanbase and vibrant atmosphere at Selhurst Park. The club has experienced several stints in the top flight and is a mainstay in the Premier League.

name: Everton
description: Everton, founded in 1878, is one of the oldest and most storied clubs in English football. With nine league titles and five FA Cups, they have a rich history and play their home games at Goodison Park.

name: Fulham
description: Fulham, founded in 1879, is the oldest professional football club in London. Known for their iconic Craven Cottage stadium by the River Thames, they have a long history and a dedicated following.

name: Liverpool
description: Liverpool, founded in 1892, is one of the most successful clubs in world football. With 19 league titles, six European Cups, and a global fanbase, they play at the historic Anfield stadium.

name: Luton Town
description: Luton Town, founded in 1885, returned to the top flight for the first time in decades in 2024. Known for their resilience and community spirit, they play at Kenilworth Road, one of the most unique stadiums in English football.

name: Manchester City
description: Manchester City, established in 1880, has become a dominant force in English football in the 21st century. With multiple league titles and an FA Cup, they play at the Etihad Stadium and are known for their attacking prowess.

name: Manchester United
description: Manchester United, founded in 1878, is one of the most iconic and successful football clubs globally. With 20 league titles, 12 FA Cups, and three UEFA Champions League titles, they play at Old Trafford, 'The Theatre of Dreams'.

name: Newcastle United
description: Newcastle United, founded in 1892, is known for its passionate fanbase and St James' Park, one of the largest stadiums in England. The club has won four league titles and six FA Cups in its history.

name: Nottingham Forest
description: Nottingham Forest, founded in 1865, is known for its rich history, including back-to-back European Cup victories in 1979 and 1980. They play at the City Ground and are one of the oldest football clubs in the world.

name: Sheffield United
description: Sheffield United, founded in 1889, is known for its rich history and Bramall Lane, one of the oldest stadiums still in use. The club has won one league title and four FA Cups.

name: Tottenham Hotspur
description: Tottenham Hotspur, established in 1882, is known for its attacking football and a rich history that includes two league titles, eight FA Cups, and a UEFA Cup. They play at the state-of-the-art Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London.

name: West Ham United
description: West Ham United, founded in 1895, is known for its strong working-class roots and passionate fanbase. The club has won three FA Cups and a European trophy. They play at the London Stadium.

name: Wolverhampton Wanderers
description:
Established in 1877, Wolverhampton Wanderers were founder members of the Football League along with eleven other clubs. Now known as the English Football League (EFL), it was the worldâ€™s first domestic football league.
Wolves, as they are commonly known, have won 17 major trophies in their history, including 11 league titles, four FA Cups and two League Cups.

name: Atlanta United FC
description: Founded in 2014 and starting MLS play in 2017, Atlanta United quickly became a powerhouse, winning the MLS Cup in 2018. Known for their passionate fanbase and high-octane style, they play at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium.

name: Austin FC
description: Austin FC, founded in 2018, joined MLS in 2021 as the league's first Texas team in nearly two decades. Known for their vibrant green colors and strong community support, they play at Q2 Stadium.

name: Charlotte FC
description: Charlotte FC, established in 2019, became an MLS expansion team in 2022. They quickly gained a strong following in North Carolina and play their home games at Bank of America Stadium.

name: Chicago Fire FC
description: Founded in 1997, Chicago Fire FC has a storied history in MLS, including an MLS Cup win in their inaugural season (1998). The club plays its home matches at Soldier Field, a historic venue in American sports.

name: FC Cincinnati
description: FC Cincinnati joined MLS in 2019 after a successful run in the USL. The club is known for its passionate fanbase and plays its home games at the newly built TQL Stadium.

name: Colorado Rapids
description: One of the original MLS teams, Colorado Rapids was founded in 1995 and won the MLS Cup in 2010. Known for their rugged style of play, they host their games at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.

name: Columbus Crew
description: Columbus Crew, a founding MLS club, was established in 1994. They have won two MLS Cups, most recently in 2020. The team plays its home games at Lower.com Field, a state-of-the-art stadium.

name: D.C. United
description: D.C. United, founded in 1995, is one of the most successful clubs in MLS history, with four MLS Cups. Known for their tradition and passionate fanbase, they play at Audi Field in the nation's capital.

name: FC Dallas
description: FC Dallas, founded in 1995, is known for its strong youth academy, producing top talent for MLS and beyond. The club plays its home games at Toyota Stadium in Frisco, Texas.

name: Houston Dynamo FC
description: Houston Dynamo, founded in 2005, quickly established themselves in MLS, winning back-to-back MLS Cups in 2006 and 2007. They play at Shell Energy Stadium and are known for their strong defensive play.

name: Inter Miami CF
description: Inter Miami CF, co-owned by David Beckham, joined MLS in 2020. The club quickly gained attention for its ambitious plans and star signings like Lionel Messi. They play at DRV PNK Stadium in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

name: LA Galaxy
description: LA Galaxy, one of the most successful MLS clubs, was founded in 1994. They have won five MLS Cups and are known for their star-studded rosters, including legends like David Beckham. The club plays at Dignity Health Sports Park.

name: Los Angeles FC
description: LAFC, established in 2014 and joining MLS in 2018, quickly became a force in the league, winning the Supporters' Shield in 2019. Known for their dynamic style, they play at Banc of California Stadium.

name: Minnesota United FC
description: Minnesota United, known as 'The Loons,' joined MLS in 2017. The club is known for its dedicated fanbase and plays at Allianz Field, a modern stadium designed to enhance the matchday experience.

name: CF MontrÃ©al
description: CF MontrÃ©al, founded in 2010 as the Montreal Impact, joined MLS in 2012. Known for their passionate fans and bilingual culture, they play at Stade Saputo and have a strong presence in Canadian soccer.

name: Nashville SC
description: Nashville SC joined MLS in 2020 and quickly made an impact with their strong defensive play. The club has a growing fanbase and plays its home games at Geodis Park, the largest soccer-specific stadium in the U.S.

name: New England Revolution
description: New England Revolution, one of the founding MLS clubs, was established in 1994. Known for their consistency and competitiveness, they play at Gillette Stadium and have a strong tradition in American soccer.

name: New York City FC
description: New York City FC, founded in 2013, joined MLS in 2015 as the league's 20th team. The club has quickly become a contender, winning the MLS Cup in 2021. They play at Yankee Stadium, sharing with the New York Yankees.

name: New York Red Bulls
description: New York Red Bulls, one of the original MLS teams, was founded in 1994. Known for their high-energy style of play and strong youth development, they play at Red Bull Arena in Harrison, New Jersey.

name: Orlando City SC
description: Orlando City SC, founded in 2010, joined MLS in 2015. Known for their passionate fanbase and vibrant atmosphere at Exploria Stadium, they have quickly become one of the most popular clubs in the league.

name: Philadelphia Union
description: Philadelphia Union, established in 2008, joined MLS in 2010. Known for their strong defensive play and tactical discipline, they play at Subaru Park, located on the banks of the Delaware River.

name: Portland Timbers
description: Portland Timbers, founded in 2009, joined MLS in 2011 and quickly became one of the league's most successful teams, winning the MLS Cup in 2015. Known for their passionate fans, they play at Providence Park.

name: Real Salt Lake
description: Real Salt Lake, founded in 2004, won their first MLS Cup in 2009. Known for their strong team chemistry and tactical discipline, they play at America First Field in Sandy, Utah.

name: San Jose Earthquakes
description: San Jose Earthquakes, one of the original MLS clubs, was founded in 1994. Known for their two MLS Cup wins (2001, 2003) and passionate fans, they play at PayPal Park in San Jose.

name: Seattle Sounders FC
description: Seattle Sounders, founded in 2007 and joining MLS in 2009, are known for their consistency and success, winning multiple MLS Cups and Supporters' Shields. They play at Lumen Field, sharing with the NFL's Seattle Seahawks.

name: Sporting Kansas City
description: Sporting Kansas City, founded in 1995 as the Kansas City Wiz, has won two MLS Cups and three U.S. Open Cups. Known for their strong community ties and innovative approach, they play at Children's Mercy Park.

name: St. Louis City SC
description: St. Louis City SC, established in 2019, joined MLS in 2023 as one of the league's newest expansion teams. Known for their deep-rooted soccer culture, they play at CityPark, a new state-of-the-art stadium.

name: Toronto FC
description: Toronto FC, founded in 2005, became the first Canadian team in MLS and has since established themselves as one of the league's premier clubs, winning the MLS Cup in 2017. They play at BMO Field.

name: Vancouver Whitecaps FC
description: Vancouver Whitecaps, founded in 2009, joined MLS in 2011 as the second Canadian team in the league. Known for their dynamic style of play, they host their matches at BC Place, a multi-purpose stadium in Vancouver.

name: Atletico Ottawa
description: Atletico Ottawa, founded in 2019, is one of the Canadian Premier League's newer teams. They are affiliated with Spain's AtlÃ©tico Madrid.
